DataElement.preferredName: Chromosome Disorder Cytogenetic or Molecular Genetic Abnormality Or Other Abnormality Occurrence Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free-text field to describe another cytogenetic, molecular or other abnormality that occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chromosome Disorder Molecular Abnormality Or Other Abnormality Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A disorder that results from a chromosomal abnormality.:A molecular or cytogenic abnormality which occurs in either human disease states or disease models._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disorder that results from a chromosomal abnormality.

Concepts.definition: A disorder that results from a chromosomal abnormality.

Concepts.definition: A molecular or cytogenetic abnormality which occurs in either human disease states or disease models.
